task.title: How to close your webdriver
task.shortdesc: To finish your test successfully you have to close your driver

prereq.p: Read the document of how to create your webdriver :

context.p: Here you will learn how to make the hook to be able to finish your test

step.cmd: Go to the Hooks class you have created
Close the webdriver in a method and use [AfterScenario] annotation over the method
Inherit the page hook into your class of the given page

result.p: You will be able to finish your test successfully

taskbody.example: If you want to run your next test you will have to create a new webdriver. In order to create a new one you need to close the old one. That's why its so important to close your driver
